resources.string: Inserisci il tuo feedback per gli sviluppatori:

Creato da:

	Alberto Vaccari
 	Hasan Yahya
 	Jiayu Hu
 	Jim Andersson
 	Henry Dang
 	Petra BÈczi
 
 **** Descrizione ****
 
 GaiaGPS è un'applicazione GPS interattiva,
 basasta su dati OSM, la quale permette
 all'Utente di trovare e pianificare viaggi, in macchina o a piedi.
 Con la sua avanzata e facile interfaccia
 l'Utente può facilmente cercare indirizzi,
 città o qualsiasi altro punto d'interesse.
 Kulplex GaiaGPS Pro presenta ulteriormente
 funzionalità social.
Clicca la freccia in basso\nper continuare"
This view shows four button:\nTravel Planner, Favourites, Social and Settings.\nBy clicking them will lead you to sub-menus.
Here you can select your destination by click ´Go to A Destination´ or ´Go to Favourite or ´Go to Coordinate´.
This is the first sub-menu of Favourites.\nYou can add and save your actual location as a point of interest into a list and select its category.
This list includes all the point of interests\naround the city.\nYou can click to select or deselect to pin them on the map one by one or all of them at the same time.
To access into Social, you have to log in.\nThe log in panel will automaticly pop up and offers the ability of log in or register.
You can get weather reports from different cities by typing in city or zip code.\nAlso you can see your friends here and send messages, whether online or offline.

Under this menu you can select from different maps (you should choose the current city where you are). On the other hand, you can personalize a bit by choosing theme of the application´s interface (colors).

It can be reached by closing the main menu and drag the small handle icon on the right side of the screen. You can interact with the map there (zoom in, zoom out, show actual location, and information)
